restaurants.name: Sunset Bistro
restaurants.description: A cozy place with a beautiful sunset view offering a variety of continental dishes.
restaurants.popular_details: Known for its evening brunches and live music.

restaurants.name: Green Garden
restaurants.description: A vibrant vegan restaurant located in the heart of the city, offering fresh and organic meals.
restaurants.popular_details: Famous for its organic smoothies and plant-based burgers.

restaurants.name: Ocean Delight
restaurants.description: A seafood paradise by the beach, offering the freshest catch of the day.
restaurants.popular_details: Best known for its seafood platter and ocean view dining.

restaurants.name: Mountain Grill
restaurants.description: A rustic grill house nestled in the mountains, offering hearty meals and stunning views.
restaurants.popular_details: Famous for its grilled steaks and craft beers.

restaurants.name: Spice Route
restaurants.description: An authentic Indian restaurant bringing the rich flavors of India to Texas.
restaurants.popular_details: Known for its spicy curries and traditional Indian desserts.

restaurants.name: Sunny Side Cafe
restaurants.description: A cozy breakfast spot known for its sunny patio and delicious morning fare.
restaurants.popular_details: Famous for its fluffy pancakes and bottomless mimosas.

restaurants.name: Garden Terrace
restaurants.description: A serene garden restaurant offering a blend of local and international cuisines.
restaurants.popular_details: Known for its farm-to-table dishes and cozy atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Bayview Grill
restaurants.description: A waterfront restaurant specializing in grilled seafood and tropical cocktails.
restaurants.popular_details: Famous for its lobster rolls and panoramic views of the bay.

restaurants.name: Rocky Mountain Diner
restaurants.description: A classic diner serving up hearty American fare with a Rocky Mountain twist.
restaurants.popular_details: Known for its bison burgers and homemade pies.

restaurants.name: Taste of India
restaurants.description: An authentic Indian dining experience offering a wide range of traditional dishes.
restaurants.popular_details: Famous for its flavorful curries and tandoori specialties.
